title: Ep. 562 The Democrats New Gun Control Strategy: Insulting us Into Submission
description:
In this episode -   Dear Democrats, cut the crap on “gun control.” https://www.conservativereview.com/articles/dan-bonginos-pro-tip-for-gun-grabbers-cut-the-crap   Is the Trump polling data wrong again? Here’s a solid theory. http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/new-polling-nightmare-trump-supporters-wont-say-it-out-loud/article/2636476   Why the Left isn’t winning the war of ideas on firearms. https://townhall.com/columnists/jonahgoldberg/2015/12/16/why-the-war-on-guns-has-failed-n2093936   Who is really paying the bulk of federal taxes? https://www.cato.org/blog/high-earners-pay-bulk-income-taxes?utm_source=Cato+Institute+Emails&utm_campaign=b1b9bddaae-Cato_at_Liberty_RSS&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_395878584c-b1b9bddaae-143016961&goal=0_395878584c-b1b9bddaae-143016961&mc_cid=b1b9bddaae&mc_eid=3fd7404a34   Unrelenting media hype and they still can’t find any evidence of Russian collusion with the Trump team.  http://www.newsmax.com/Headline/mueller-trump-dossier-russia/2017/10/04/id/817735/  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
